activity_differential: group grilling and preparing food outdoors
description: A group of people are gathered outdoors under trees near water, collaboratively grilling meat on a barbecue. Several individuals are actively handling the grill and food, while others are present and interacting socially. The camera moves slightly to capture different angles of the group and the grilling activity.
